      • onPicked

        protected abstract void onPicked​(Player player)
        Ran when a player picks this item up. Usually increment some of the player's stats.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that picks this item up.

      • getAfterBombed

        public StillObject getAfterBombed()
        Return a floor, because item should be destroyed and replaced with a floor when bombed.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        A new Floor object.
